content: and not to twist attach main colour mc work according to chart a row 1-6 chart a is repeated 10 11 rnds 1-10 knit 12 times on the round round 11 work *yo k2tog* repeat * - * to the next round work according to chart a row 7 end of the round until 1 st remains before the temporary bor rnds 12-22 knit marker work the last st with mc instead of cc sm undo the provisional co if necessary and pick up 60 66 72 sts along the provisional co next round work according to chart a row 8 edge onto a spare circular needle fold the until 1 st remains before the temporary bor work along round 11 leaving stockinette facing marker work the last st with cc instead of out and the provisional co edge inside the mc remove the temporary bor marker and folded cuff knit each stitch on the outside k2 with mc the bor is now back at the needle together with the corresponding stitch beginning of needle 1 on the inside needle thus attaching the fold finish the stranded colourwork by working chart a row 9-13 chart a is repeated 10 11 12 times on the round cut cc and switch back to smaller needles if preferred work in stockinette stitch for 40 rnds or to desired leg length chart a dreaming of happiness page 2/4 heel gusset k16 k17 k18 this is the new bor pick up 14 16 18 sts or one stitch per two row of the heel flap along both edges of the redistribute sts as follows the first 31 33 35 heel flap and on each side one more st sts of the round onto needle 1 and the last 29 between the heel flap and needle 2 place the 33 37 sts of the round onto needle 2 sts on needle 1 together with the 19 19 21 attach cc and work the heel flap with cc heel turn sts knit the sts on needle 1 and 2 working back and forth over the 31 33 35 sts with mc on needle 1 as follows continue working the sts on needle 2 instep row 1 rs k31 k33 k35 turn in stockinette stitch and work the gusset decreases on needle 1 as follows row 2 ws sl1 *p1 sl1 wyif* repeat * - * until 2 sts remain p2 turn round 1 ssk knit until 2 sts remain on needle 1 k2tog row 3 rs sl1 k30 k32 k34 turn round 2 knit repeat row 2 and 3 until there are 28 32 36 row in total in the heel flap or to desired heel repeat rnds 1 and 2 on needle 1 and work sts flap length and you have just finished row 2 on needle 2 in stockinette stitch until 31 33 35 sts remain on needle 1 work the round heel turn as follows row 1 rs sl1 k17 k18 k19 ssk k1
